links.title: Stocks Rise On December 29 But Trouble Lies Beneath
links.description: Stocks finished the day slightly higher, with the S&P 500 rising by 14 bps and the Qs finishing lower by one bps. A lot is going on in the market, even though it seems like a whole bunch of nothing.

links.title: Stock Volatility
links.description: Stock volatility is calculated from the historical prices of equity instruments and shows the degree of variability in the returns. In the context of Modern Portfolio Theory, the risk-return relationship is the theoretical association between the performance expected from investment and the amount of risk assumed in that investment.
